Class Encounter

java.lang.Object
Encounter
public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object
Class to handle encounters between the Player and other characters on the map.
Author:
George paul

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Character character
    To store the character in the encounter.
    private Location currentLocation
    Location on the map where encounter takes place.
    private Player player
    To store the player.
    private java.lang.String[] riddleAnswers
    Answers to the riddles.
    private java.lang.String[] riddleArray
    List of riddles (kindof) to be posed to the user in order to recruit an Ally.
    private java.util.Scanner sc
    For user input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Encounter​(Player player, Ally ally, Location location)
    Second constructor method starts recruitments.
    Encounter​(Player player, Enemy enemy, Location location)
    First constructor method starts battles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void battle()
    A method that prompts the user for input on choices that they want to make during the battle as well as handling the attacks between the characters.
    private void recruit()
    A method that prompts the user for input on the recruitment quiz

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Encounter​(Player player, Enemy enemy, Location location)
      First constructor method starts battles.

      player - The player object
      enemy - The enemy object
      location - The current location

      location - The current location
